item.title: Mongodb Bulk Updates
item.description: At one point, in your backend you will have a case where you need to update a bulk of data, due one reason or another. In this case, i am going to focus on bulk documents updating in mongodb. Setup Start off your mongodb shell: $ mongod some_db Create a javascript file called bulk_write.js and add the following code . We will use this to in insert 10000 documents of receipts type document into the db.
